means: （赋予神、动物或其他事物人的特点的）拟人论

word_mean: 拟人说，拟人论，人格化：以人类形态或特征加于非人类对象
用人类的特征或属性来描述、理解非人类（如动物等）的特征或属性。

sentence.Network_en: One uses the language of anthropomorphism in saying that God sees, hears, knows, and loves.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们说上帝能见, 能听, 能知, 能爱,就是在使用神人同性论的言语.

sentence.Network_en: Science considers anthropomorphism toward animals a grave mistake, even a sin.
sentence.Network_cn: 科学认为这是一个极大的错误甚至是罪过.

PerfectNetExp.abs: "拟人化"(Anthropomorphism)是一种拟人法的外在表现方式，指将人类的形态、外观、特征、情感、性格套用到非人类的生物、物品， …
英美(分析)哲学用词英汉对照表 - 豆丁网 ... appeal to ignorance 诉诸无知 anthropomorphism 拟人论 a posteriori 后验.
例如类比(analogy)策略，有学者将其和拟人(anthropomorphism)共用，也有学者称其为“架桥策略”：利用原有的直觉知识，在被学生误 …
anthropometry 人体测量术anthropomorphism 拟人皱anthropomorphology 人类形态学

list.abs: 拟人神（Anthropomorphic God）的观念最早由希腊哲学家色诺芬尼（Xenophanes）提出，人类按照自己形象与本性而设想一个神系…
anthropomorphic dummy 人体模型anthropomorphic system 拟人系统anthropomorphic thinking 拟人化思维
anthropomorphic system 拟人系统anthropomorphic thinking 拟人化思维anthropomorphism 拟人论
anthropometry 人体测量学anthropomorphic dummy 人体模型anthropomorphic system 拟人系统

entry.tran: （认为动物、神和物体都具有人类的情感或特征的）拟人论，拟人观
entry.def: Anthropomorphism is the idea that an animal, a god, or an object has feelings or characteristics like those of a human being.

means.word_mean: 1. the representation of objects (especially a god) as having human form or traits

auth_sentence.content: Lyrically Longstreth indulges in some fairly extreme anthropomorphism here.
